sections.heading: or breach of peace.Any person subject to this code who causes or participates in any riot or breach of the peace shall be punished as a court-martial may direct

sections.text:
55-474.Riot or breach of peace.

Any person subject to this code who causes or participates in any riot or breach of the peace shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 74, p. 1579.
